item.description:
Ok lets all head out and listen to some music and shake, wiggle, rock and roll, we are the best group around when it comes to HAVING FUN

 

When you come in ask the Hostess for" Eva's table",  food is very good and reasonable, they usuually have good price buster specials, and they have give plenty.

There will be several groups joining, in addition I look forward to meeting PWOP Burlington Meet Up group.

 Band Spiral Circus

 Starts 9pm-1am

News! Beat the Clock!

No cover change if you get in before 8:30pm and enjoy our menu while listening to your favorite band or watching your favorite team on one of our many screens, all the way up to midnight.

group.name: The Portsmouth "and beyond" Nite Out Meetup Group

item.name: Dancing to Live Band "Spiral Circus"
